shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when an error occurs during local video mixing.
Callback for errors during local video mixing.

p.codeblock: virtual void onLocalVideoTranscoderError(const TranscodingVideoStream& stream, VIDEO_TRANSCODER_ERROR error)

section.p: When calling or fails, the SDK triggers this callback to report the failure reason.
When or fails, the SDK triggers this callback to report the reason for the failure.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when calling or fails.

plentry.pd: The video stream that could not be mixed during video mixing. See .
The reason for local video mixing failure. See .
Video stream that cannot be mixed during video mixing. See .

Reason for the local video mixing error:
1: The specified video source has not started video capture. You need to create a video track and start capture.
2: Invalid video source type. You need to specify a supported video source type.
3: Invalid image path. You need to specify the correct image path.
4: Invalid image format. Make sure the image format is PNG, JPEG, or GIF.
5: Invalid resolution after mixing.
20: Internal error.
